name: Racecraft
description: Start racing in many asynchronous events for free. Accumulate Season Points each month by competing in Championships, Tournaments and Special Events on always new circuits created by the Racing Authority, climbing to higher licenses. Check out the Premium DLC for even more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Sp1 - 8 - 8.1 - 10 Processor: AMD Athlon X2 2.8 GHZ, Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450, Nvidia GeForce GT 460 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: No support for Integrated Graphics Chipset, Shader Model 5.0 required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Sp1 - 8 - 8.1 - 10 Processor: AMD Athlon X2 2.8 GHZ, Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHZ Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 290x, Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: No support for Integrated Graphics Chipset, Shader Model 5.0 required
